sentences.english: Chaos Hydras are the most powerful creature of the Fortresses.
sentences.chinese: 遠古巨獸是據點裏最強大的生物。

sentences.english: In fact I was afraid of those jagged monstrosities all around and over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 事實上我害怕我們頭頂四周那些鋸齒狀的巨獸。

sentences.english: Discerning Eye of the Beast procs should now be more obvious.
sentences.chinese: 比斯巨獸之眼的效果現在更加明顯。

sentences.english: Once the enterprise stalwart, it is now looking like a struggling behemoth.
sentences.chinese: 曾經是企業之友的黑莓現在看上去更像是掙扎的巨獸。

sentences.english: To his surprise the beast rose up with a roar of glee.
sentences.chinese: 誰料那巨獸歡快地吼叫着站起身來。

sentences.english: Of black sea surface base, seem to conceal an innumerable to bite the person's deep sea huge monster.
sentences.chinese: 的黑色海面下，似乎潛藏着無數噬人的深海巨獸。

sentences.english: However, the state is far from being a predictable monolith.
sentences.chinese: 然而，政府是一個難以預測的巨獸。

sentences.english: These fearsome beasts have small cannons, comparable to serpentines, mounted on their backs.
sentences.chinese: 這些恐怖巨獸揹負著類似蛇炮的小型加農炮。

definition: Chinese treasure ship, a type of large sailing ship in the fleet of Ming dynasty admiral Zheng He 鄭和|郑和[Zheng4 He2]
variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
